articles.title: Tyla Taps Out Early at H&M’s Brazil Event After Performance - TMZ
articles.description: Tyla had folks freaking after she was spotted getting carried out of a Brazil party -- but relax, it wasn’t what it looked like.

articles.title: Loni Anderson’s Cause Of Death Revealed - Deadline
articles.description: Loni Anderson, twice Emmy-nominated star of WKRP in Cincinnati, died of a rare form of cancer, according to a death certificate obtained by TMZ.

articles.title: Lil Nas X to Remain Jailed Through the Weekend Following Arrest and Hospitalization - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Authorities say he'll remain behind bars until Monday, and a source close to the rapper tells The Hollywood Reporter that he hasn't been allowed visitors yet.

articles.title: ‘Peacemaker’ Star Steve Agee Says Season 2’s Last Three Episodes Are Like a “Whole New Season” - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The actor experienced highs and lows on his journey with John Economos, including losing his mother in between 'The Suicide Squad' and landing on 'Peacemaker.'

articles.title: 'Dexter: Resurrection' Season 2 Writers Room, 'Original Sin' Canceled - Deadline
articles.description: 'Dexter' franchise reevaluated: 'Resurrection' moving on with Season 2 writers room commissioned. Prequel 'Original Sin' has been canceled.

articles.title: ‘Mandalorian’ Star Katee Sackhoff ‘Basically Didn’t Work’ for 3 Years After ‘Star Wars’ Show Because She ‘Didn’t Understand’ Her Character: ‘It Broke Me’ - Variety
articles.description: 'Mandalorian' actor Katee Sackhoff said she lost her confidence and 'basically didn't work' for 3 years after her role.

articles.title: ‘Nobody 2’ Producers David Leitch and Kelly McCormick Talk ‘Gears of War’ and Moving on From ‘Jurassic World’ - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The 87North principals — and real-life married couple — reveal how they landed a new director just eight weeks before production on the Bob Odenkirk sequel and discuss how 'Fall Guy' helped push the stunt Oscar over the finish line.

articles.title: David Ketchum, Agent 13 on ‘Get Smart,’ Dies at 97 - Variety
articles.description: David Ketchum, a voice actor and comedian who played Agent 13 on “Get Smart” and appeared in “Camp Runamuck,” died on Aug. 10. He was 97.

articles.title: Lorne Michaels confirms SNL cast members will leave before season 51, reveals 1 actor's return - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: Lorne Michaels has confirmed that there will be cast changes at 'Saturday Night Live' ahead of season 51. Bowen Yang previously declined to answer EW's inquiry about whether or not he'd return.

articles.title: How Yunchan Lim changed my mind about Tchaikovsky’s ‘Seasons’ - NPR
articles.description: In a new album, the youngest ever Van Cliburn winner puts his own stamp on Tchaikovsky's undervalued set of piano pieces called The Seasons.

articles.title: ‘The Institute’ Renewed for Season 2 at MGM+ - Variety
articles.description: MGM+ has renewed "The Institute" for Season 2.

articles.title: Nothing lasts forever, except maybe the Goo Goo Dolls - NPR
articles.description: The band's frontman, John Rzeznik, talks about their new EP, Summer Anthem, and how, as he approaches 60, he might consider taking guitar lessons.
